projects.title: Human Powered Recumbent Bike (ASME Human powered vehicle Challenge 2015)
projects.description: Mentor : Dr Atul Thakur, IIT PatnaIt involved the designing and fabrication of a human powered vehicle for HPVC '15. Mytasks included:Design and construction of the Aerodynamic fairing for the vehicle.Preparation of the CAD model of the vehicle using CATIA v5.Static structural load analysis and aerodynamic flow analysis using ANSYSResult: The vehicle was awarded 5th position in the design event.
